text: The Paterson Visitations (also known as the Triangles) were an American basketball team based in Paterson, New Jersey that was a member of the American Basketball League. Before the 1936-1937 season the Brooklyn Visitations moved to Paterson and became the Paterson Visitations. During the first half of the 1936-1937 season, the team moved back to Brooklyn on November 21, 1936 and became the Brooklyn Visitations again. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1936-37 |ABL |N/A |N/A |} Category:Basketball teams in New Jersey Category:Sports in Paterson, New Jersey
